name: Monster Manor (Nix Hydra Games)
description:
A magical mansion has fallen into disrepair, and it needs the help of a very special renovator.

Meet its extraordinary residents, fix up its rooms, and help return it to its former glory.

This story can be found by downloading the Fictif app for free, available in the Google Play Store and App Store. Fictif contains multiple visual novel stories to play in various genres.
